badges.name: OSHA 10-Hour General Industry
badges.description: Foundational OSHA safety training for general industry workers. Covers hazard identification, worker rights, and employer responsibilities under OSHA regulations.

criteria.label: Complete all 10 hours of OSHA coursework
Pass the final assessment with 70% or higher
Attend a live Q&A session with an instructor

badges.name: Fire Safety Awareness
badges.description: Covers fire prevention, evacuation procedures, and extinguisher use. Participants learn to identify fire hazards and respond effectively to fire emergencies in the workplace.

criteria.label: Complete fire prevention training module
Demonstrate correct fire extinguisher technique
Participate in an evacuation drill

badges.name: Hazard Communication
badges.description: Understanding chemical hazards and SDS documentation. Learn to read Safety Data Sheets, properly label containers, and communicate chemical risks to coworkers.

criteria.label: Identify all GHS pictograms and their meanings
Correctly interpret a Safety Data Sheet
Complete the hazard communication quiz

badges.name: PPE Compliance
badges.description: Proper selection and use of personal protective equipment. Covers eye protection, gloves, respiratory protection, and hearing conservation in various work environments.

criteria.label: Complete PPE selection training for your role
Pass a fit test for respiratory protection
Demonstrate proper donning and doffing procedures

badges.name: Emergency Response
badges.description: Procedures for workplace emergencies including spills and injuries. Learn to activate emergency systems, administer basic first aid, and coordinate with emergency services.

criteria.label: Complete emergency action plan training
Obtain basic first aid certification
Participate in a tabletop emergency exercise

badges.name: Ergonomics Fundamentals
badges.description: Workplace ergonomics to prevent musculoskeletal disorders. Covers workstation setup, proper lifting technique, and strategies for reducing repetitive strain injuries.

criteria.label: Complete the ergonomics awareness module
Submit a workstation self-assessment
Demonstrate safe lifting technique

badges.name: Git Version Control
badges.description: Proficiency in Git workflows including branching and merging. Covers commit hygiene, pull request reviews, rebasing, and collaborative development patterns.

criteria.label: Create and manage feature branches
Resolve a merge conflict in a pull request
Use interactive rebase to clean up commit history

badges.name: REST API Design
badges.description: Designing clean, documented RESTful APIs. Covers resource modeling, HTTP methods, status codes, versioning, and OpenAPI specification authoring.

criteria.label: Design a resource-oriented API for a sample domain
Write an OpenAPI specification for your API
Implement pagination and filtering

badges.name: Cloud Fundamentals
badges.description: Core cloud computing concepts across AWS, Azure, and GCP. Covers compute, storage, networking, and identity services with hands-on labs.

criteria.label: Deploy a virtual machine to a cloud provider
Configure object storage with access policies
Set up a basic VPC with public and private subnets
Pass the cloud fundamentals assessment

badges.name: Docker Containers
badges.description: Building, running, and orchestrating containerized applications. Covers Dockerfiles, multi-stage builds, Docker Compose, and container security best practices.

criteria.label: Write a multi-stage Dockerfile for a web app
Create a Docker Compose setup with multiple services
Scan a container image for vulnerabilities

badges.name: Company Culture
badges.description: Understanding organizational values and workplace expectations. New hires learn the company mission, core values, and how to contribute to a positive work environment.

criteria.label: Complete the company history and mission module
Attend a meet-and-greet with your department

badges.name: Systems Access
badges.description: Setting up accounts and accessing key internal systems. Covers email, Slack, project management tools, and IT helpdesk procedures.

criteria.label: Set up multi-factor authentication on all accounts
Verify access to all required internal tools
Complete the IT security acknowledgement form

badges.name: Security Basics
badges.description: Information security fundamentals and best practices. Covers password management, phishing awareness, data classification, and incident reporting.

criteria.label: Complete the security awareness training
Pass the phishing simulation exercise
Set up a password manager

badges.name: Benefits Orientation
badges.description: Overview of health insurance, 401k, and company benefits. Understand enrollment deadlines, plan options, and how to access employee assistance programs.

criteria.label: Review all available benefit plans
Complete benefits enrollment by the deadline

badges.name: Communication Skills
badges.description: Effective professional communication strategies. Master active listening, giving constructive feedback, and adapting communication styles for different audiences.

criteria.label: Complete the active listening workshop
Deliver a practice feedback session with a peer
Submit a written communication sample for review

badges.name: Strategic Thinking
badges.description: Frameworks for strategic planning and decision-making. Learn SWOT analysis, OKR setting, and how to translate organizational vision into actionable goals.

criteria.label: Complete a SWOT analysis for a real project
Draft OKRs for your team's next quarter
Present your strategic plan to a review panel

badges.name: Team Management
badges.description: Leading and motivating teams for peak performance. Covers delegation, conflict resolution within teams, performance reviews, and building psychological safety.

criteria.label: Complete the delegation and empowerment module
Conduct a mock performance review
Facilitate a retrospective meeting

badges.name: Time Management
badges.description: Prioritization and productivity techniques. Learn the Eisenhower matrix, time-blocking, and strategies for managing competing priorities without burnout.

criteria.label: Complete the time management self-assessment
Use time-blocking for one full work week
Submit a reflection on productivity improvements

badges.name: Public Speaking
badges.description: Confident presentation and public speaking skills. Practice structuring a talk, managing nerves, engaging an audience, and using visual aids effectively.

criteria.label: Deliver a 5-minute presentation to a live audience
Receive and incorporate peer feedback
Record and self-review a practice talk

badges.name: Conflict Resolution
badges.description: Navigating workplace conflicts with professionalism. Learn de-escalation techniques, mediation basics, and how to find mutually beneficial resolutions.

criteria.label: Complete the conflict styles assessment
Role-play a mediation scenario
Write a reflection on a past conflict and lessons learned

badges.name: Computer Basics
badges.description: Fundamental computer skills and file management. Covers operating system navigation, file organization, keyboard shortcuts, and basic troubleshooting.

criteria.label: Navigate the file system and organize files into folders
Demonstrate 10 essential keyboard shortcuts
Troubleshoot a common software issue

badges.name: Email Communication
badges.description: Professional email etiquette and management. Learn to compose clear messages, manage your inbox efficiently, and use email features like filters and signatures.

criteria.label: Compose a professional email with proper formatting
Set up inbox filters and an email signature

badges.name: Online Safety
badges.description: Protecting personal information and avoiding scams. Covers recognizing phishing attempts, secure browsing habits, privacy settings, and safe online behavior.

criteria.label: Identify phishing emails in a simulated inbox
Configure privacy settings on a social media account
Complete the online safety quiz with 80% or higher

badges.name: HIPAA Compliance
badges.description: Healthcare privacy and security regulations. Understand protected health information, patient rights, breach notification requirements, and technical safeguards.

criteria.label: Complete the HIPAA Privacy Rule training
Complete the HIPAA Security Rule training
Pass the compliance assessment with 85% or higher

badges.name: SOX Reporting
badges.description: Sarbanes-Oxley financial reporting requirements. Learn internal controls, audit documentation, and how to maintain compliance with SOX provisions.

criteria.label: Complete the SOX overview module
Document internal controls for a sample process
Participate in a mock audit review

badges.name: GDPR Fundamentals
badges.description: European data protection regulation compliance. Covers data subject rights, lawful processing bases, data protection impact assessments, and cross-border transfers.

criteria.label: Identify the six lawful bases for processing personal data
Complete a data protection impact assessment template
Pass the GDPR knowledge check

badges.name: Forklift Operation
badges.description: Certified forklift operation and safety procedures. Covers pre-operation inspections, load handling, pedestrian safety, and OSHA forklift regulations.

criteria.label: Complete the classroom forklift safety course
Pass the hands-on driving evaluation
Perform a pre-operation inspection checklist

badges.name: Crane Safety
badges.description: Overhead crane operation and rigging procedures. Learn load calculation, sling selection, hand signals, and safe crane operation practices.

criteria.label: Complete the crane operation theory module
Demonstrate proper hand signals for crane operations
Calculate load weights and select appropriate rigging
Pass the practical crane operation test

badges.name: Equipment Inspection
badges.description: Pre-operation inspection protocols and maintenance checks. Learn to identify wear, damage, and safety concerns before operating heavy equipment.

criteria.label: Complete the equipment inspection training module
Fill out an inspection checklist for three equipment types
Identify and report a simulated deficiency
